mapper.update: update b_department set sys_id = #{sysId},dep_name = #{depName} where flow_id = #{flowId}
update b_system set sys_name = #{sysName} where flow_id = #{flowId}
mapper.select: select r.flow_id,sys_id,dep_id,role_name,r.create_time,s.sys_name from b_role r inner join b_system s on r.sys_id = s.flow_id
select d.flow_id,sys_id,dep_name,d.create_time,s.sys_name from b_department d inner join b_system s on d.sys_id = s.flow_id

SELECT m.flow_id, p.flow_id perId, m.sys_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_level, m.path, m.component, m.icon, m.menu_parent_id, m.perms, m.order_num, m.create_time, QUERY, edit, export, impower FROM b_system_menu_tree m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.flow_id, p.user_id, p.role_id, p.sys_id, p.dep_id, p.menu_id, p.menu_parent_id, p.create_time, QUERY, edit, export, impower FROM b_permission p LEFT JOIN b_role r ON r.flow_id = p.role_id LEFT JOIN b_user u ON u.flow_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN b_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.flow_id AND ur.user_id = u.flow_id LEFT JOIN b_department d ON d.flow_id = r.dep_id WHERE 1=0 or r.flow_id = #{roleId} or b.flow_id = #{userId} or d.flow_id = #{depId} ) p ON m.flow_id = p.menu_id where m.menu_parent_id = #{menuParentId} ORDER BY m.order_num;

select m.flow_id, m.sys_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_level, m.path, m.component, m.icon, m.menu_parent_id, m.perms, m.order_num, m.create_time, QUERY, edit, export, impower from b_user u inner join b_user_role ur on u.flow_id = ur.user_id inner join b_role r on r.flow_id = ur.role_id inner join b_permission p on r.flow_id = p.role_id inner join b_system_menu_tree m on m.flow_id = p.menu_id where m.menu_parent_id = #{menuParentId} and u.flow_id = #{userId} and (ISNULL(p.QUERY) or p.QUERY = 1) order by m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.flow_id, p.flow_id perId, m.sys_id, menu_name, menu_level, m.menu_parent_id, m.create_time, QUERY, edit, export, impower FROM b_system_menu_tree m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM b_permission WHERE 1 = 0 OR role_id = #{roleId} OR user_id = #{userId} OR dep_id = #{depId} ) p ON m.flow_id = p.menu_id AND m.sys_id = p.sys_id WHERE m.sys_id = #{sysId} and menu_level = 0 ORDER BY m.flow_id
SELECT flow_id, sys_id, menu_name, menu_level, path, component, icon, menu_parent_id, perms, order_num, create_time FROM b_system_menu_tree order by order_num

SELECT m.flow_id, m.sys_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_level, m.path, m.component, m.icon, m.menu_parent_id, m.perms, m.order_num, m.create_time, QUERY, edit, export, impower FROM b_user u inner join b_user_role ur on u.flow_id = ur.user_id inner join b_role r on r.flow_id = ur.role_id inner join b_permission p on r.flow_id = p.role_id inner join b_system_menu_tree m on m.flow_id = p.menu_id where u.flow_id = #{userId} and p.QUERY = 1 order by m.order_num
